chunk_text: Structure fire at downtown warehouse. Multiple units responding.
Armed robbery in progress at convenience store on 5th Avenue. Suspect armed.
Vehicle collision on Highway 101 near exit 42. Two cars involved with minor injuries.
Mass fire spreading rapidly in warehouse district threatening nearby homes.
Break-in at jewelry store on Main Street. Alarm triggered. Police responding.
Shoplifting in progress at downtown mall. Security pursuing suspect.
Pickpocket incident reported in busy transit station.
Crowd stampede at event venue. Multiple injuries reported.
Public nuisance complaint: Loud noise and disturbance in residential area.
Terrorist attack suspected at government building. Bomb squad en route.
